title: Spain Aims to Ban Social Media for Children Under 16
summary_full: The announcement is part of a broader push by countries to curb access to online platforms for minors. It also points to Europe’s stricter approach to regulating social media.
summary_public: The announcement is part of a broader push by countries to curb access to online platforms for minors. It also points to Europe’s stricter approach to regulating social media.

ES.label: positive
ES.evidence: Europe’s stricter approach to regulating social media
